txt.en: 'I was alongside Glorfindel and EÃ¤rnur when Angmar fell. I know I shall see it fall again.'
'Although the Witch-king has not been seen in Angmar in many years, Mordirith rules in his name.'
'The Enemy corrupts and twists all it touches. Beware that you are not touched by it.'
'Take care that you are not seen coming into our camp. The Enemy has eyes everywhere.'
